tool_description: Validates and standardizes taxpayer addresses using postal service databases and geocoding services.

street_address.description: Street address including number and street name

error_messages: Address not found: No matching address found in postal databases
Invalid postal code: Postal code format is incorrect for the specified region
Invalid state code: Use valid state or province abbreviations
Incomplete address: Street address must include both number and street name
Country not supported: Address verification not available for specified country
usage: Enter complete address components including street, city, state, and postal code. Tool validates against postal databases and returns standardized address.
